attributes.action: Raise the issue of Chemical use in Syria & UK role/ policy on current situation
attributes.background:
Up to 100 people were killed and hundreds injured yesterday in the deadliest nerve-gas attack in Syria in four years.

Witnesses said that missiles filled with sarin nerve gas were fired suffocating civilians as they slept.
Hours later the planes returned and bombed a field hospital.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure where or how you would like the UK Government to raise this issue. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
